text1:
This is a corporate website I created at the request of a friend.
I made everything from design to implementation by myself.
I consciously incorporated animations to prevent the site from looking cheap.
Since I had little experience with animations,
it was a great opportunity for me to delve into them extensively.
techUsed: techUsed: Next.js, recoil, anime.js, tailwind, shadcn, typescript, etc
